name: Jack Dice
description:
Made for the 48 hour GMTK Jam 2022

Shoot all the enemies that cross your path!!

But what is this? Your weapon changes randomly!!

Carefully plan your moves and go to the end.

Controls:
-Mouse to Aim
-Left Click to shoot
-W A S D to Move

Credits : Team "The Lomitos"
https://julianlanty.itch.io // Programmer, Artist, Design
https://albert-sanchez.itch.io/ // Programmer
https://satirimusic.itch.io/ , https://soundcloud.com/satiri-guzman // Music & SFX
